mapper.select: select * from book join category on category_category_seq = category_seq where category_seq = (select category_category_seq as category_seq from customer_preference where customer_customer_seq = #{customer_seq}) limit 6
mapper.insert: insert book(book_isbn, book_name, book_year, book_img, category_category_seq) values(#{book_isbn}, #{book_name}, #{book_year}, #{book_img}, #{category_category_seq})
